video_prompt: Figure's head slowly tilts downward, eyes subtly blink, and lips curve into a faint, serene smile. Hairpiece shimmers as hair gently shifts. Earring sways with a soft, reflective gleam. Collar subtly adjusts around the neck. Background hues subtly transition from warm to cool.
image_prompt: Portrait of a young man with long dark wavy hair, anime/manga style. He looks up and right, head tilted back. Fair skin, parted lips, ethereal blue/grey eyes with long lashes. Light blue/silver floral hairpiece, long teardrop earring. Light-colored high-collared garment, possibly Eastern fantasy attire. Dark, indistinct background with subtle warm/cool tones. Serene, elegant, and introspective.
refined_video_prompt: A head slowly tilts, eyes subtly blinking. Lips gently curve into a serene smile. Hair and its adornment shimmer, softly shifting. An earring sways with a reflective gleam. The collar subtly adjusts. Background hues smoothly transition from warm to cool.
